recommendations: Kelsey Lotus Wong
Creative Facilitator | Experience Designer | Culture Consultant
November 20, 2013, Kelsey Lotus reported directly to jenny

Jenny Poon is many things. First and foremost, she is a mover and shaker. But a humble one, she let's her actions and impact speak for her. Jenny is also an innovator, creative problem-solver and futurist. She has the vision, plans strategically and executes. Where there’s a will, there’s a way and Jenny is hellbent on making change happen, particularly in her community and city. As a boss, Jenny is a great motivator who constantly inspires her team to dream big and empowers them to produce great work. This coupled with the collaborative “yes environment” she has cultivated provides a powerful sense of space and freedom to experiment. To me, this is an ideal environment because it allows you to turn your ideas into action, even if it means failing (which she is flexible with as long as you learn something valuable, of course!) In summary, I highly recommend Jenny as a champion and community leader in any venture she chooses. Lucky are those who have the opportunity to collaborate and work closely with her.
Kelsey Lotus Wong

Curtis Miller
Co-founder at Velocity Labs
June 14, 2012, Curtis worked with jenny but at different companies

Jenny is an amazing person and a boon to the Phoenix area. Her vision for CO+HOOTS has inspired and motivated many people (me included :) to do more and be more. She has a very strong desire to see Phoenix prosper and grow.I also worked with Jenny to bring the first Startup Weekend to downtown Phoenix and hosted it at CO+HOOTS. She worked with the organizers to iron out the details, make sure the space was ready and even stayed to participate in the weekend by sharing her design skills with the startup teams.I've hosted, or co-hosted, many events at CO+HOOTS and each has been enthusiastically supported by Jenny.

Michael Zimmerlich
President at 80/20 Records and Crowdfunding Advisor
June 20, 2016, Michael worked with jenny in the same group

Michael assisted us in setting up and launching our crowdfunding campaign for our new location.  In addition he sat down with us to develop a marketing plan for the entire timeframe.  Our goal was $50,000 and ended up raising over $53,000 at the end of the campaign.

Kelsey Lotus Wong
Creative Facilitator | Experience Designer | Culture Consultant
February 29, 2016, jenny managed Kelsey Lotus directly

I had the opportunity to work with Kelsey during a growing stage of our company. We needed a person who could lead, have great vision and follow through. We were so lucky to have found Kelsey. She came in, took charge and propelled us forward without fear. Very few times do you find an individual that has both the ability to dream and the ability to accomplish. She took our little business and doubled our numbers and brought new meaning to coworking culture. Kelsey has both strengths. She is an incredible partner and an incredible leader. Give her the end goal, get out of her way, and she will make it happen. I think beyond the ability to dream and actually implement, Kelsey has this incredible skill of empathy. This skill in the workplace is often lost when companies scale. I’m not sure how she does it. I think she somehow leaves her body and is able to inhabit another humans body to digest their thoughts and then return to her body to speak words and relate to others. It’s quite magical and is what truly makes her a leader above all others. She takes on overwhelming tasks with curiosity and when faced with unsurmountable odds is able to develop a strategy to find success. She’s organized huge events with more than 700 attendees, empowered young children to build startups and has been the glue to our community. She is an asset to any team and a leader in any role she chooses to commit to.
Kelsey Lotus Wong
